resources.string: All your quiz projects (i.e. %1$d in total) have been successfully migrated. You will now be able to find them in the form of QCM files in your new workspace.
Some of your quiz projects have been successfully migrated to your new workspace; ie a total of %1$d. However, some elements encountered problems during the migration (ie %2$d migration error(s)).
Oops, unfortunately due to an unexpected error none of your quiz projects could be migrated to your new workspace. So a total of %1$d project(s) in all.
You will have to manually migrate these projects by exporting them in QCM file yourself by returning to your old \'Creations\' space when you wish.
Complete the migration process now in order to found all your unmigrated projects on this new workspace as QCM files ready to be played, shared or edited.

plurals.name: message_x_projects_waiting_for_migration
plurals.item: You have currently %1$d projects that are waiting to be migrated to your new workspace.
You have currently %1$d project that is waiting to be migrated to your new workspace.
